pages.caption: Here we see Tom in his natural state: slouched over a box of pizza, dimly illuminated by the soap opera on his TV.
This is an average Saturday night for Tom.
Suddenly, circles of multicolored light begin to dance around the room as the pizza in his hand begins to float.
Tom briefly catches a glimpse of a spaceship through the window before being engulfed by a bright blue light.
Pulled through the night sky between swirling disco lights, Tom realizes that this is no average Saturday night...
